alert.note: Alert for Glades; Hendry; Inland Collier County; Inland Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 5:57PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Hendry and Glades Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 557 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms capable of producing a landspout along a line extending from Moore Haven to near Ortona to near Charleston Park. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, wind gusts up to 50 mph, and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Clewiston, Labelle, Moore Haven, Lakeport, Montura, Palmdale, Felda, Port La Belle, Devils Garden, Ortona, Muse, Lake Hicpochee, Harlem and Keri. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE LIGHTNING...EXCESSIVE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Glades; Hendry; Inland Collier County; Inland Palm Beach County
